title: Air travel sucks now | Tell Me More
description:
Flying wasn’t a particularly enjoyable experience prior to the pandemic, and it certainly wasn’t during it. But now, the experience is even worse as the air travel industry struggles to adjust to the influx of passengers eager to get back to the friendly skies. Terry Nguyen, a reporter at The Goods by Vox, explains.

Learn more:  Read Terry’s story about air travel here. 
Tell Me More is hosted by Emily Stewart and produced by Sofi LaLonde.
